''' Special Coilgrass Sigils''' are an exploration mechanic in [[Natlan]]. They look like a regular [[Coilgrass Sigil]], but with a small green bulb rotating around it.

Like regular Coilgrass Sigils, they can be grappled to using the [[Yumkasaurus]] and [[Scions of the Canopy]] ability to move swiftly. Special Coilgrass Sigils additionally confer the ability to create a temporary floating platform, a '''Leaf of Repose''', at the player's current position using the [[Elemental Skill]] button. This ability is indicated by a small green bulb rotating around the player character.
